answers.answer: All medical services and medicines necessary for the treatment of COVID-19 are covered by the FNUASS in Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Measures for patients with COVID - 19'.

answers.answer: Insured persons, uninsured persons, and other individuals on the territory of Romania diagnosed with COVID-19 qualify for covered medical services and medicines.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Measures for patients with COVID - 19'.

answers.answer: Individuals in Romania showing COVID-19 symptoms can benefit from remote consultations offered by their family doctor or a specialist doctor.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Measures for patients with COVID - 19'.

answers.answer: Eligibility is for persons with confirmed infection via rapid antigen or NAAT/RT-PCR test in Corona Forms, who do not require oxygen therapy, have mild or moderate COVID-19 manifestations, and at least 2 risk factors, without needing a referral note.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The "Post-Covid-19 Syndrome Evaluation" service was introduced to help patients who continue to present symptoms for a long period, even after experiencing a mild form of the disease.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The "Post-Covid-19 Syndrome Evaluation" service is available as part of medical services provided during day hospitalization, but the specific access procedure is not detailed here.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Patients who show moderate or severe respiratory insufficiency after COVID-19 upon leaving the hospital, or who have passed through a SARS-CoV-2 triage system, can qualify for a continuous oxygen administration device.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Details about the procedure for obtaining continuous oxygen administration devices or noninvasive ventilation devices are presented in the Medical devices chapter.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Patients with post-COVID-19 conditions can benefit from physical therapy, psychological counseling, and psychotherapy.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: These services are covered by the health insurance system, provided that the doctors offering them work in clinics under contract with the health insurance house.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Doctors from the clinical specialties of cardiology and pneumology can recommend physical therapy, psychological counseling, and psychotherapy for post-COVID-19 conditions.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Individuals can get COVID-19 vaccinations in Bucharest at family medicine offices.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Addresses where you can get covid vaccination in Bucharest'.

answers.answer: A list of family medicine offices in Bucharest where one can get a COVID-19 vaccination is available for download on the website.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Addresses where you can get covid vaccination in Bucharest'.
